body.p: The statement of methods is important because:

multiple_choice.choice: Similar to the task and problem statement, you are gaining an understanding of the business needs.
It allows you to define the types and sources of data that can produce the target insight for an analytical task.

feedback.p: Correct: A better understanding of the business needs will lead to well defined problems, objectives, tasks and ultimately meeting the client's expectations.
Incorrect: The statement will define suitable methods to be used to produce the target functionality/insight for the task given the available data.

body.p: A data scientist is tasked to discover the inherent groupings in a marketing firm's customer dataset. The analytic objectives have been defined and it is time to select the appropriate method for this objective.

feedback.p: Correct: Unsupervised learning methods are best applied to tasks were an outcome is not known.
Incorrect: You are finding patterns in unlabeled data (the scenario involves unlabeled data) but you are not seeking out patterns.
Incorrect: In our question, you do not know what the groupings will be. A supervised learning method involves a task with known outcomes.
